title: How to Prepare Santa's Whiskers and Molasses Crinkles from Domata Living Flour

steps.headline: Pre-heat oven to 375 °F (191 °C) In mixing bowl cream together Crisco and sugar; blend in milk and vanilla.
Stir in four, cherries, and pecans.
Form dough into two 8-inch rolls.
steps.description: Roll in flaked coconut to coat outside.

steps.headline: Wrap in waxed paper or clear plastic wrap; chill thoroughly.
steps.description: Cut into ¼ inch slices, place on un-greased cookie sheet.

steps.headline: Bake until edges are golden, about 12 minutes.
Roll into balls the size of large walnuts (small scoop).
Place sugared side up 3” apart on greased baking sheet.
steps.description: Flatten a little with the palm of your hand.

steps.headline: Sprinkle each cookie with 2-3 drops of water to produce a crackled surface.
Bake 9-11 minutes at 375° until set but not hard.

text: Making Santa's Whiskers Pre-heat oven to 375 °F (191 °C) In mixing bowl cream together Crisco and sugar; blend in milk and vanilla.  Stir in four, cherries, and pecans.  Form dough into two 8-inch rolls. Roll in flaked coconut to coat outside. Wrap in waxed paper or clear plastic wrap; chill thoroughly. Cut into ¼ inch slices, place on un-greased cookie sheet. Bake until edges are golden, about 12 minutes. Will make about 60 cookies. Making the Molasses Crinkles Chill dough.  Roll into balls the size of large walnuts (small scoop).  Dip tops in sugar.  Place sugared side up 3” apart on greased baking sheet. Flatten a little with the palm of your hand. Sprinkle each cookie with 2-3 drops of water to produce a crackled surface.  Bake 9-11 minutes at 375° until set but not hard.  Finished.
